languages.text: "Ох ты ж... это тот самый бедолага? Которому анверы язык отрезали?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Кто ты? Ты из ртути? Нет? Я слышал вчера ночью кто-то вломился в соседний номер, бедняга так кричал...

languages.text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"
languages.original_text: "Ох ты ж... это тот самый бедолага? Которому анверы язык отрезали?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, dear Throne... wasn't he that poor fellow? The one who got his tongue cut out by Anvers?"
"Oh, dear Throne... wasn't he that poor fellow? The one who got his tongue cut out by Anvers?"
"Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"
"Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"
"Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

languages.text: “噢，黄金王座在上……就是那个人，是吧？那个被安维尔帮割掉了舌头的可怜人？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，黄金王座在上……就是那个人，是吧？那个被安维尔帮割掉了舌头的可怜人？”

languages.text: «Por el Trono... es ese, ¿verdad? El pobre diablo al que los Anvers le cortaron la lengua».
languages.original_text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

traits.locale_text: «Por el Trono... es ese, ¿verdad? El pobre diablo al que los Anvers le cortaron la lengua».

languages.text: 「あぁ、王座にかけて…アイツだな？アンヴァースに舌を切り取られた哀れな愚か者の？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、王座にかけて…アイツだな？アンヴァースに舌を切り取られた哀れな愚か者の？」

languages.text: "Oh, beim Thron ... das ist er, oder? Der arme Kerl, dem die Anvers die Zunge rausgeschnitten haben?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, beim Thron ... das ist er, oder? Der arme Kerl, dem die Anvers die Zunge rausgeschnitten haben?"

languages.text: « Oh, par le Trône... C'est lui, n'est-ce pas ? Le pauvre type qui s'est fait couper la langue par les Anver ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, par le Trône... C'est lui, n'est-ce pas ? Le pauvre type qui s'est fait couper la langue par les Anver ? »

languages.text: "Taht aşkına... Bu o, değil mi? Dili Anverlar tarafından kesilen zavallı adamcağız?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, by the Throne... that's him, isn't it? The poor sap who got his tongue cut out by the Anvers?"

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Taht aşkına, bu o, değil mi? Dili Anverlar tarafından kesilen zavallı eleman?"
